title: Shrimp and Beans
introduction: Shrimp and Beans is a delightful dish inspired by the simple, yet flavorful seafood preparations from a renowned restaurant in Forte dei Marmi. The combination of succulent shrimp and hearty beans creates a meal that is both nourishing and satisfying.
ingredients: 16 to 20 large shrimp, peeled and deveined
Salt and freshly ground black pepper
3 cups drained cooked or canned cannellini or Great Northern beans

instructions.description: In a bowl, drizzle the shrimp with 2 tablespoons of the oil, half the garlic, 1 tablespoon of the basil, and salt and pepper to taste. Stir well. Cover and refrigerate 1 hour.
Place a barbecue grill or broiler rack about 5 inches away from the heat source. Preheat the grill or broiler.

In a saucepan, cook the remaining oil, garlic, and basil over medium heat about 1 minute. Stir in the beans. Cover and cook over low heat 5 minutes or until heated through. Remove from the heat. Stir in the tomatoes, and salt and pepper to taste.
Broil the shrimp on one side until lightly browned, 1 to 2 minutes. Turn the shrimp and cook until lightly browned and just opaque in the thickest part, about 1 to 2 minutes more.
Spoon the beans onto 4 plates. Arrange the shrimp around the beans. Garnish with fresh basil leaves. Serve immediately.
